name: Drunk Wizards (itch)
description:
Intense multiplayer action shooter game about some drunk magicians fighting with each other with different spells.

On each map you can find different bottles of Magic Ale wich will provide you with mana and power ups. But too much ale may cause intoxication. Hard to fight after a dozen of bottles, isn't it?

Current state:

Release date is:Third quater 2016

GameServers is still in development, place on server is limited.

Soon on steam.Install instructions:

0. Extract all contents of the .zip file onto your harddrive

1. Run game.
